newsitem.title: USA: Alumax says raises unalloyed aluminum price.
newsitem.headline: Alumax says raises unalloyed aluminum price.

text.p: Alumax Inc's wholly owned subsidiary Alumax Primary Aluminum Corp said Monday that it raised the monthly transaction price of an lb of unalloyed aluminum (P1020 tee) for the month of August.
The company said the price for an lb of unalloyed aluminum increased to $0.84 an lb from $0.80 in the previous month.
